short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply material theme colors to Bubble.io style editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Bubble Color Enhancer Chrome Extension â€“ a sleek tool designed to elevate the aesthetic appeal of your Bubble apps. This extension solves the common challenge of managing colors within Bubble, offering a seamless way to create and apply harmonious color palettes. By leveraging the power of the Material Color Generator, it automatically generates refined color schemes and injects them directly into your Bubble app, ensuring a polished, cohesive look with minimal effort. Say goodbye to color management headaches and give your Bubble apps the vibrant, professional design they deserve!
